  • Method Details

    • createTableByCount

      public tech.tablesaw.api.Table createTableByCount​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> data) throws CustomError, java.lang.NullPointerException

      This Method takes in a list of sentimental categorization and outputs a Table Object There are 5 types of sentimental categorization which includes: "Very Negative", "Negative", "Neutral", "Positive" and "Very Positive"

      The method also counts the number of invalid string in the list and returns an error message with the information

      Parameters:
      data - ArrayList containing Sentimental categorization
      Returns:
      Table object consisting two column; Column 1 list the sentimental categorization; Column 2 list of number of counts associated with the sentimental categorization
      Throws:
      CustomError
      java.lang.NullPointerException
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      https://javadoc.io/doc/tech.tablesaw/tablesaw-core/0.25.2/tech/tablesaw/api/Table.html

    • printTable

      public void printTable​(tech.tablesaw.api.Table table)

      This method print the table information

      Parameters:
      table - Table object
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      https://javadoc.io/doc/tech.tablesaw/tablesaw-core/0.25.2/tech/tablesaw/api/Table.html

    • displayBarChart

      public void displayBarChart​(tech.tablesaw.api.Table table, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String javascriptVar) throws CustomError, java.io.IOException

      This method creates a Bar Chart based based on the Table input data. Then the Bar Chart is insert into a html file specified by the user in the form of javascript

      Parameters:
      table - Table object
      filename - html file to insert Bar Chart javascript
      javascriptVar - specify the javascript getElementById variable
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Error druing write operation
      CustomError - Either Table is Empty or the file type is not html
      Since:
      1.0
      See Also:
      https://javadoc.io/doc/tech.tablesaw/tablesaw-core/0.25.2/tech/tablesaw/api/Table.html

    • displayPieChart

      public void displayPieChart​(tech.tablesaw.api.Table table, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String javascriptVar) throws CustomError, java.io.IOException

      This method creates a Bar Chart based based on the Table input data. Then the Bar Chart is insert into a html file specified by the user in the form of javascript
